reply.zh: 您好，我们已为您检查订单，您的付款已经成功，但系统激活可能存在延迟......
reply.en: Hi, we've checked your order and the payment went through successfully, but the system may need a short time to activate your VIP...

reply.zh: 如果您是通过 Google Play / App Store 订阅的，请按照以下步骤操作取消自动续费……
reply.en: If you subscribed via Google Play / App Store, please follow these steps to cancel the auto-renewal...

subcategories.name: Copied link but app says it is empty

reply.zh: 请您先在 TikTok 中点击【分享】-【复制链接】，然后再回到我们的应用……
reply.en: Please make sure you tap 'Share' → 'Copy link' in TikTok first, then come back to our app...

reply.zh: 当前网络连接不稳定，建议您切换 Wi-Fi 或 4G/5G 后重试……
reply.en: The current network connection is unstable. Please switch to a more stable Wi-Fi or mobile data and try again...
